title: Technical Lead
description: Develop and maintain .Net web applications using full SDLC and Agile Scrum methodologies.
Develop and maintain web applications interface with 3rdparty integrations, ensuring high traffic functionality.
Provide consultation to business application, web architecture and cloud solution.
Contribute to software enhancement, deployment, maintenance, and support.
Developed web application or web API by using .Net 7.0/.Net 8.0, Bootstrap v5, and JavaScript.
Upgrade Azure DevOps server from version 2020 to 2022.
Setup Self-hosted Windows agents and Azure CI/CD pipeline for .Net projects running in Azure Cloud or on-premise server.
Conduct source code reviews, maintained Git CI/CD pipelines, and repositories.
Established standard Git flow processes and CI/CD pipeline templates using Azure DevOps.
Deployed and hosted applications on AWS/Azure, ensuring scalable and efficient cloud infrastructure for optimal performance and reliability.
Involved in resource screening, evaluation, interviews, and hiring decisions.
Mentor and assist junior developers.

title: Senior Software Engineering
description: Develop and maintain various .Net web application using full SDLC or Agile scrum and hosted in AWS or Azure.
Develop and maintain web applications interface with 3rdparty integration.
Integrated Azure AD and Singpass into .Net projects.
Deploy and maintain the serverless container in AWS EKS include Database (MS SQL).
Create API gateway using AWS API gateway and node JS in AWS Lambda.
Develop and maintain the microservices in .Net core projects with AWS serverless.
Fine tuning the .net core projects to improve the performance in AWS EKS.
Setup CICD into development environment and assist DevOps team setup CICD in GCC projects (Bamboo, Bitbucket, and etc.).
Setup and created CICD pipeline template in Azure DevOps and integrate with SAST tools such as SonarQube, Fortify scan, checkmarx, and etc.
Setup sitefinity CMS projects in AWS and Azure TFS.
Develop and maintain sitefinity CMS projects using .net mvc framework and .net core mvc.
Responsible to perform source code review, maintain git CI/CD pipeline and repositories.
Managing a small development teams on different development projects and maintenance projects.
Responsible to interview developer, quiz assessment for the candidate and hiring decision.

title: Senior Software Engineering
description: Develop and maintain various .Net web application using full SDLC or Agile scrum and hosted in AWS or Azure.
